mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STS_DB.comments (product_id, user_id, content, created_time, parent_id) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{createdTime}, #{parentId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM STS_DB.comments c WHERE c.product_id = #{productId} AND c.parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY c.created_time DESC
SELECT c.* FROM STS_DB.comments c WHERE c.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY c.created_time ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM STS_DB.comments WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_id = #{id}
